DOC.brief_summary: The investigators performed a 8-week, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled human trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Fig paste on functional constipation. The investigators measured colon transit time, frequency of defecation, defecation time, stool type, and abdominal discomfort.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of a Ficus Carica in Subjects With Functional Constipation
